headline: S&P Global Announces Key Leadership Appointments for Mobility Business
summary: S&P Global (NYSE: SPGI) today announced the appointment of key leadership roles in the S&P Global Mobility ("Mobility") division, effective today.

raw.headline: S&P Global Announces Key Leadership Appointments for Mobility Business
raw.summary: S&P Global (NYSE: SPGI) today announced the appointment of key leadership roles in the S&P Global Mobility ("Mobility") division, effective today.

headline: CARFAX: Urgent 'Do Not Drive' Recalls Spike 65% Since Summer 2024
summary: In a concerning spike affecting hundreds of thousands of drivers nationwide, the number of critical "Do Not Drive" recalls has jumped more than 65% since the summer of 2024, to 725,000, according to CARFAX data.

raw.headline: CARFAX: Urgent 'Do Not Drive' Recalls Spike 65% Since Summer 2024
raw.summary: In a concerning spike affecting hundreds of thousands of drivers nationwide, the number of critical "Do Not Drive" recalls has jumped more than 65% since the summer of 2024, to 725,000, according to CARFAX data.
